title: Slow cooker chicken and noodle soup
ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '2 1/2 tablespoons mixed vegetable flakes', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1/4 teaspoon dried tarragon', '3/4 teaspoon celery salt', '1 onion, chopped', '65g diced carrots', '825ml chicken stock', '2 teaspoons chicken stock granules', 'salt to taste', '250g plain flour', '1 tablespoon grated Cheddar cheese', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon milk']
